name: Medical Symptom Checker & Health Assistant with GPT-4-mini
description:
# AI Medical Symptom Checker & Health Assistant

A responsible, privacy-focused health information assistant that provides general health guidance while maintaining strict safety protocols and medical disclaimers.

## ‚ö†Ô∏è IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER

This tool provides general health information only and is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns.

## üöÄ Key Features

### Safety First
- **Emergency Detection**: Automatically identifies emergency situations
- **Immediate Escalation**: Provides emergency numbers for critical cases
- **Clear Disclaimers**: Every response includes medical disclaimers
- **No Diagnosis**: Never attempts to diagnose conditions
- **Professional Referral**: Always recommends consulting healthcare providers

### Core Functionality
- **Symptom Information**: General information about common symptoms
- **Wellness Guidance**: Health tips and preventive care
- **Medication Reminders**: General medication information
- **Multi-Language Support**: Serve diverse communities
- **Privacy Protection**: No data storage, anonymous processing
- **Resource Links**: Connects to trusted health resources

## üéØ Use Cases

1. **General Health Information**: Learn about symptoms and conditions
2. **Pre-Appointment Preparation**: Organize questions for doctors
3. **Wellness Education**: General health and prevention tips
4. **Emergency Detection**: Immediate guidance for critical situations
5. **Health Resource Navigation**: Find appropriate care providers

## üõ°Ô∏è Safety Protocols

### Emergency Keywords Detection
- Chest pain, heart attack, stroke
- Breathing difficulties
- Severe bleeding, unconsciousness
- Allergic reactions, poisoning
- Mental health crises

### Response Guidelines
- Never diagnoses conditions
- Never prescribes medications
- Always includes disclaimers
- Encourages professional consultation
- Provides emergency numbers when needed

## üîß Setup Instructions

1. **Configure OpenAI API**
   - Add your API key
   - Set temperature to 0.3 for consistency

2. **Review Legal Requirements**
   - Check local health information regulations
   - Customize disclaimers as needed
   - Implement required data policies

3. **Emergency Contacts**
   - Update emergency numbers for your region
   - Add local health resources
   - Include mental health hotlines

4. **Test Thoroughly**
   - Verify emergency detection
   - Check disclaimer display
   - Test various symptom queries

## üí° Example Interactions

**General Symptom Query:**
- User: "I have a headache for 3 days"
- Bot: Provides general headache information, self-care tips, when to see a doctor

**Emergency Detection:**
- User: "Chest pain, can't breathe"
- Bot: EMERGENCY response with immediate action steps and emergency numbers

**Wellness Query:**
- User: "How can I improve my sleep?"
- Bot: General sleep hygiene tips and healthy habits information

## üè• Integration Options

- **Healthcare Websites**: Embed as support widget
- **Telemedicine Platforms**: Pre-consultation tool
- **Health Apps**: General information module
- **Insurance Portals**: Member resource
- **Pharmacy Systems**: General drug information

## üìä Compliance & Privacy

- **HIPAA Considerations**: No PHI storage
- **GDPR Compliant**: No personal data retention
- **Anonymous Processing**: Session-based only
- **Audit Trails**: Optional logging for compliance
- **Data Encryption**: Secure transmission

## üö® Limitations

- Cannot diagnose medical conditions
- Cannot prescribe treatments
- Cannot replace emergency services
- Cannot provide specific medical advice
- Should not delay seeking medical care

## üîí Best Practices

1. Always maintain clear disclaimers
2. Never minimize serious symptoms
3. Encourage professional consultation
4. Keep information general and educational
5. Update emergency contacts regularly
6. Review and update health information
7. Monitor for misuse
8. Maintain audit trails where required

## üåç Customization Options

- Add local emergency numbers
- Include regional health resources
- Translate to local languages
- Integrate with local health systems
- Add specific disclaimers
- Customize for specific populations

Start providing responsible health information today!

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

workflow.name: AI Medical Symptom Checker & Health Assistant

parameters.content:
## üè• AI HEALTH ASSISTANT

**IMPORTANT DISCLAIMER:**
This tool provides general health information only and is NOT a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult qualified healthcare providers for medical concerns.

### ‚ú® Features:
‚Ä¢ Symptom analysis & information
‚Ä¢ General health guidance
‚Ä¢ Medicine reminders
‚Ä¢ Appointment scheduling hints
‚Ä¢ Emergency detection
‚Ä¢ Multi-language support
‚Ä¢ Privacy-first design

### üéØ Use Cases:
‚Ä¢ Initial symptom research
‚Ä¢ Health education
‚Ä¢ Medication tracking
‚Ä¢ Wellness tips
‚Ä¢ Pre-appointment preparation

## ‚ö†Ô∏è SAFETY PROTOCOLS

**Emergency Detection:**
‚Ä¢ Chest pain ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Breathing difficulty ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Stroke symptoms ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Severe bleeding ‚Üí Call 911
‚Ä¢ Loss of consciousness ‚Üí Call 911

**Auto-Escalation:**
‚Ä¢ Detects emergency keywords
‚Ä¢ Provides emergency numbers
‚Ä¢ Refuses diagnosis
‚Ä¢ Recommends immediate care

**Privacy:**
‚Ä¢ No data storage
‚Ä¢ Anonymous processing
‚Ä¢ HIPAA considerations
‚Ä¢ Encrypted transmission

## üìã SYMPTOM CATEGORIES

**Supported Areas:**

**General:**
‚Ä¢ Fever & chills
‚Ä¢ Fatigue
‚Ä¢ Pain locations
‚Ä¢ Weight changes

**Respiratory:**
‚Ä¢ Cough types
‚Ä¢ Breathing issues
‚Ä¢ Congestion

**Digestive:**
‚Ä¢ Stomach pain
‚Ä¢ Nausea
‚Ä¢ Changes in habits

**Mental Health:**
‚Ä¢ Stress levels
‚Ä¢ Sleep patterns
‚Ä¢ Mood changes

**Skin:**
‚Ä¢ Rashes
‚Ä¢ Changes
‚Ä¢ Irritations

## üîß CONFIGURATION

**Required Setup:**
- [ ] OpenAI API key
- [ ] Emergency contacts database
- [ ] Disclaimer acceptance
- [ ] Language settings

**Optional:**
- [ ] Medical database API
- [ ] Translation service
- [ ] SMS notifications
- [ ] Healthcare provider API
- [ ] Appointment systems

**Compliance:**
‚Ä¢ Review local regulations
‚Ä¢ Add required disclaimers
‚Ä¢ Implement data retention
‚Ä¢ Audit logging

## üí¨ EXAMPLE INTERACTIONS

**User:** "I have a headache for 3 days"
**Bot:** Provides general info about headaches, when to see doctor, self-care tips

**User:** "Chest pain can't breathe"
**Bot:** EMERGENCY - Call 911 immediately

**User:** "Remind me medications"
**Bot:** Sets up medication schedule

**User:** "Rash on arm, itchy"
**Bot:** General info about rashes, suggests pharmacist/doctor visit

**User:** "Feeling anxious lately"
**Bot:** Mental health resources, coping strategies, professional help info

## üìä FEATURES ROADMAP

**Current:**
‚úÖ Symptom information
‚úÖ Emergency detection
‚úÖ General guidance
‚úÖ Multi-language

**Planned:**
üîÑ Medicine interactions
üîÑ Appointment booking
üîÑ Health tracking
üîÑ Family profiles
üîÑ Wearable integration
üîÑ Telemedicine prep
üîÑ Insurance info
üîÑ Prescription reminders

**Future:**
üîÆ AI health predictions
üîÆ Personalized wellness
üîÆ Medical record analysis

nodes.name: Health Query Webhook
nodes.notes: Receives health-related queries with strict privacy

nodes.name: Safety Check & Categorization
nodes.notes: Checks for emergencies and categorizes queries

nodes.name: Emergency Response
nodes.notes: Immediate emergency response with contact numbers

assignments.name: response
assignments.value:
=üö® EMERGENCY DETECTED üö®

**CALL EMERGENCY SERVICES IMMEDIATELY:**

üá∫üá∏ USA: 911
üá¨üáß UK: 999
üá™üá∫ EU: 112
üá¶üá∫ Australia: 000

**Your message suggests a medical emergency.**

While waiting for help:
1. Stay calm
2. Don't drive yourself
3. Unlock doors for paramedics
4. Have medications list ready
5. Call someone to be with you

**This is an automated response. Get immediate medical help!**

nodes.name: Health Information AI
nodes.notes: Provides general health information with strict guidelines

values.content:
=You are a helpful health information assistant. You provide general health information and wellness guidance while being very careful to:

1. NEVER diagnose conditions
2. NEVER prescribe medications
3. NEVER replace professional medical advice
4. ALWAYS recommend consulting healthcare providers for medical concerns
5. ALWAYS emphasize this is general information only

Your responses should be:
- Informative but cautious
- Empathetic and supportive
- Clear about limitations
- Focused on general wellness
- Encouraging professional consultation

For symptom queries:
- Provide general information about possible causes
- Suggest when to see a doctor
- Offer comfort measures if appropriate
- Never minimize serious symptoms

For medication queries:
- Only provide general information
- Emphasize consulting pharmacists/doctors
- Never suggest specific dosages
- Mention common side effects only generally

Always end with a disclaimer about seeking professional medical advice.

nodes.name: Format Health Response
nodes.notes: Adds disclaimers and resources to response

assignments.name: disclaimer
assignments.value:
=‚öïÔ∏è **Important Medical Disclaimer:**
This information is for educational purposes only and is not a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always seek the advice of your physician or other qualified health provider with any questions you may have regarding a medical condition.

assignments.name: resources
assignments.value:
=üìû **Health Resources:**
‚Ä¢ Find a doctor: https://doctor.webmd.com/
‚Ä¢ Symptom checker: https://www.mayoclinic.org/symptom-checker/
‚Ä¢ Mental health: https://www.samhsa.gov/find-help/national-helpline
‚Ä¢ Poison control: 1-800-222-1222 (US)

nodes.name: Compile Final Response
nodes.notes: Creates structured response with all necessary information

nodes.name: Send Response
nodes.notes: Returns health information with appropriate headers

**Healthcare Systems:**

‚Ä¢ Symptom databases
